alert.note: Alert for Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 18 at 5:19PM EST until February 19 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an ice jam is expected. * WHERE...Parts of Steuben County in New York along the Canisteo River and tributary streams, between Cameron Mills and Addison. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 512 PM EST, Emergency management reported an extensive ice jam in the Canisteo River between Rathbone and Addison. Minor flooding is occurring, mainly in fields near County Highway 119. Water may also affect side roads near the river, and could back up along tributary streams and creeks. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Rathbone... Addison. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
